author: ggregory
msg: Test getContent() and getContent().getContentInfo() in isolation for VFS-427: NPE on HttpFileObject.getContent().getContentInfo(). No issue yet.

author: prestonc
msg: VXQUERY-42 The implementation for all supported type comparison for lt, le, gt, ge, eq and ne.

author: prestonc
msg: VXQUERY-33 The update adds missing date, time and datetime arithmetic functions. In addition to correct exceptions for unsupported function and overflow computations.

author: prestonc
msg: The pointables now implement the ITimezone interface.

author: prestonc
msg: The update contains a new function to apply the timezone to a date, datetime or time pointable through a timezone interface.
